summary: Diff implements web-search nutrition lookup via Google Custom Search (env-configured) with snippet parsing heuristics, adds a new nutritionSource='web-search' path in the nutrition fallback chain, improves meal prompt parsing to capture longer restaurant/menu item names, adjusts portion gram estimates for burger-like items, and updates Description results UI to display source badges. Diff also includes several broader UI/layout refactors and additional modules not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale UI/UX refactor across multiple pages (Dashboard/Study/Goals/Gym/Nutrition), addition of a new Description page and navigation changes beyond the requested Quick Log source indication.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update Quick Log (Description) results UI to show nutrition source badges; it does not request redesigns or workflow changes replacing manual logging with a Description CTA.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded unrelated nutrition/exercise data modules and placeholder hooks not tied to the web-search nutrition feature (e.g., comprehensive exercise library, Indian nutrition module, empty useQueries placeholder, live time widget).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1..REQ-4; scope is restaurant/menu parsing + web-search nutrition + source labeling.

hallucinated_features.description: Use of DeepSeek Chat Completions endpoint for parsing free-text descriptions into structured entries within descriptionFlow.ts.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (and BuildRequest emphasizes showing the user it's not "asking ChatGPT for everything"; while DeepSeek was mentioned as existing fallback, implementing/expanding AI parsing for description is extra scope relative to the specified changes).
